title: Inga Vaanthey Lyrics Muthal Idam Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Singers: Haricharan, Surmukhi
Song: Inga Vaanthey
Lyrics : Arivumathi
Music Director : D Imman
Movie: Muthal Idam

Inga Vaanthey, Inga Vaanthey
Thalli poanthey, thalli poanthey
Nethaane nethane nilavin pethi thaane
Ne poga ne poga nizhalum vellai thaane
Moochil pookum thavaram, moondran paalil vervidum
Seendathey seendathey, chella chella
Seendathey seendathey, chella chella. Ohh...ohh

Inga Vaanthey, Inga Vaanthey
Thalli poanthey, thalli poanthey
Nethaane nethane nilavin pethi thaane
Ne poga ne poga nizhalum vellai thaane
Moochil pookum thavaram, moondran paalil vervidum
Seendathey seendathey, chella chella
Seendathey seendathey ...

En koondhalil en kadhalai, pinniye pinniye parpenada
En naatkalai, un moochinal vazhven naanada
Kadhal koothe, Koothe
Aadum naathe, naathe
Rettai udal, ottrai uyir, ippodhu thaan paarkiren
Otrai irul, netri mudi, thotte uyir thorkiren
Ennai ninaithaye, thummi salithaen,
Seendathey seendathey, chella chella
Seendathey seendathey, chella chella.

Kaipesiye vetkapada,
muthame sathamaai thanthaaiyada
Kannadiye kaigal thatta sernthom naamada
Kaigal koosa, koosa
Kaalgal pesa, pesa
Mittaai silai, thotten unnai,gittar isai ketkuthe
thottal mazhai, vittal veyil,sattar yena thaakuthe
Undhan udai poada, enthan idai kooda
Seendathey seendathey, chella chella
Seendathey seendathey, chella chella.

Inga Vaanthey, Inga Vaanthey
Thalli poanthey, thalli poanthey
Nethaane nethane nilavin pethi thaane
Ne poga ne poga nizhalum vellai thaane
